```{r}

# Load required library
library(readxl)

# Import dataset
Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_ <- read_excel(
  "G:/R files/Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_Final.xlsx",
  col_names = FALSE
)

# Loop through columns
for (colname in names(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_)) {
  
  column_data <- Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_[[colname]]
  
  # Check if numeric
  if (is.numeric(column_data)) {
    
    # Show 5-point summary
    cat("===== 5-Point Summary for", colname, "=====\n")
    print(fivenum(column_data, na.rm = TRUE))
    cat("\n")
    
    # Boxplot
    boxplot(column_data,
            main = paste("Boxplot of", colname),
            col = "lightblue")
  }
}
```

```{r}
# Load library
library(readxl)

# Read data
Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_ <- read_excel(
  "G:/R files/Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_Final.xlsx",
  col_names = FALSE
)

# Convert selected columns to factors
Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_$`...2`  <- as.factor(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_$`...2`)
Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_$`...3`  <- as.factor(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_$`...3`)
Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_$`...4`  <- as.factor(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_$`...4`)
Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_$`...6`  <- as.factor(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_$`...6`)
Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_$`...7`  <- as.factor(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_$`...7`)
Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_$`...8`  <- as.factor(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_$`...8`)
Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_$`...9`  <- as.factor(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_$`...9`)
Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_$`...10` <- as.factor(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_$`...10`)
Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_$`...11` <- as.factor(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_$`...11`)

# Loop through columns
for (colname in names(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_)) {
  
  column_data <- Typical_Employee_Survey_Data_3_[[colname]]
  
  # If numeric: summary + boxplot
  if (is.numeric(column_data)) {
    cat("===== 5-Point Summary for", colname, "=====\n")
    print(fivenum(column_data, na.rm = TRUE))
    cat("\n")
    
    boxplot(column_data,
            main = paste("Boxplot of", colname),
            col = "lightblue")
    
    # If factor: counts + barplot
  } else if (is.factor(column_data)) {
    cat("===== Frequency Counts for", colname, "=====\n")
    print(table(column_data))
    cat("\n")
    
    barplot(table(column_data),
            main = paste("Barplot of", colname),
            col = "lightgreen")
  }
}
```
